item.description:
Please bring a dish to share with us and we will do the same! We look forward to chatting over dinner. Afterwards, we will show a movie in the living room. The movie selection is Big Eden.

Please come directly to the Common House which is the big building you see across the interior yard when you first come in the Cornwall Street entrance. Come in through the vestibule and turn left into our Great Room. We will be there to welcome you.

Note: We will not be a giving a full tour of the facility on this occasion. These are offered during Sunday morning brunches. But you will get a sense for the layout.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask anyone for Diane or Jeney
item.name: Pot Luck Dinner and Movie at JP Cohousing
